name: Shortcuts
description: Perform common tasks with your keyboard.
author: Mathieu Ablasou <taupiqueur.kanto@gmail.com>

001.goBack.description: Navigation · Go back to the previous page in tab’s history

002.goForward.description: Navigation · Go forward to the next page in tab’s history

004.reloadTabWithoutCache.description: Navigation · Reload selected tabs, ignoring cached content

005.goToNextPage.description: Navigation · Go to the next page in the series

006.goToPreviousPage.description: Navigation · Go to the previous page in the series

008.goUp.description: Navigation · Go up in the URL hierarchy

009.goToRoot.description: Navigation · Go to the root URL

013.copyURL.description: Clipboard · Copy URL of selected tabs

014.copyTitle.description: Clipboard · Copy title of selected tabs

015.copyTitleAndURL.description: Clipboard · Copy title and URL of selected tabs

016.openWebSearchForSelectedText.description: Web search · Perform a web search for selected text

025.scrollToTop.description: Scroll · Scroll to the top of the page

026.scrollToBottom.description: Scroll · Scroll to the bottom of the page

030.toggleFullScreen.description: Zoom · Turn full-screen mode on or off

031.openNewTab.description: Create tabs · Open and activate a new tab

032.openNewTabRight.description: Create tabs · Open and activate a new tab to the right

033.openNewWindow.description: Create tabs · Open a new window

034.openNewIncognitoWindow.description: Create tabs · Open a new window in Incognito mode

037.closeRightTabs.description: Close tabs · Close tabs to the right

038.closeWindow.description: Close tabs · Close the window that contains the tab

039.restoreTab.description: Close tabs · Reopen previously closed tabs

041.togglePinTab.description: Tab state · Pin or unpin selected tabs

042.toggleGroupTab.description: Tab state · Group or ungroup selected tabs

043.toggleCollapseTabGroups.description: Tab state · Collapse or uncollapse tab groups

044.toggleMuteTab.description: Tab state · Mute or unmute selected tabs

046.sortTabsByURL.description: Organize tabs · Sort selected tabs by URL

047.groupTabsByDomain.description: Organize tabs · Group selected tabs by domain

048.renameTabGroup.description: Manage tab groups · Rename tab group

049.cycleTabGroupColorForward.description: Manage tab groups · Cycle forward through tab group colors

050.cycleTabGroupColorBackward.description: Manage tab groups · Cycle backward through tab group colors

051.activateAudibleTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the first audible tab

052.activateNextTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the next open tab

053.activatePreviousTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the previous open tab

054.activateFirstTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the leftmost open tab

055.activateSecondTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the second leftmost open tab

056.activateThirdTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the third leftmost open tab

057.activateFourthTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the fourth leftmost open tab

059.activateSixthTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the sixth leftmost open tab

060.activateSeventhTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the seventh leftmost open tab

061.activateEighthTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the eighth leftmost open tab

062.activateLastTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the rightmost open tab

063.activateLastActiveTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the last active tab

064.activateSecondLastActiveTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the second last active tab

065.activateThirdLastActiveTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the third last active tab

066.activateFourthLastActiveTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the fourth last active tab

070.activateEighthLastActiveTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the eighth last active tab

071.activateNinthLastActiveTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the ninth last active tab

072.activateNextWindow.description: Switch tabs · Activate the next open window

073.activatePreviousWindow.description: Switch tabs · Activate the previous open window

075.moveTabLeft.description: Move tabs · Move selected tabs left

076.moveTabRight.description: Move tabs · Move selected tabs right

077.moveTabFirst.description: Move tabs · Move selected tabs to the far left

078.moveTabLast.description: Move tabs · Move selected tabs to the far right

079.moveTabNewWindow.description: Move tabs · Move selected tabs to a new window

080.moveTabPreviousWindow.description: Move tabs · Move selected tabs to the previous open window

081.selectActiveTab.description: Select tabs · Deselect all other tabs

082.selectPreviousTab.description: Select tabs · Select the previous tab

083.selectNextTab.description: Select tabs · Select the next tab

085.selectTabsInGroup.description: Select tabs · Select tabs in group

087.selectRightTabs.description: Select tabs · Select tabs to the right

088.moveTabSelectionFaceBackward.description: Select tabs · Move tab selection’s face backward

089.moveTabSelectionFaceForward.description: Select tabs · Move tab selection’s face forward

090.bookmarkTab.description: Bookmarks · Save selected tabs as bookmarks

091.bookmarkSession.description: Bookmarks · Save the current session as bookmarks

092.addTabToReadingList.description: Reading list · Add selected tabs to your reading list

096.openClearBrowserDataPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the “Delete browsing data” page
